attributes.action: Halal Slaughter is cruel to animals and has no place in Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
Ritual Halal Slaughter involves an animal being killed by having its throat cut across while still alive and fully conscious. This is cruel to the animal, and is unacceptable in a humane society.

There is no reason why this needs to take place to satisfy a minority religion, as stunning is permitted under Islamic law.

The government should bring forward legislation banning ANY method of slaughter that does not involve some form of stunning before slaughter.
